name: Sea Trader
description:
Start with one boat and develop an economic empire!

This is my entry for the Water Themed Game Jam - February 2021.

Depending on the level of the ship, you have a different number of actions and storage slots.

You can buy a ship or upgrade it in port. Also, you can trade in the port.

Every 5 days an octopus moves, if it hits a cell with your ship, the ship will be destroyed. At the port, you can buy a prediction of the octopus movement.

Every 10 days the range of things for sale in ports is being updated.

You can buy any building and upgrade it to get some passive money.

If you have a trap in your ship you can try to catch a fish.

If you have a papyrus on your ship you can try to write a story.

Enjoy!

p.s. I do not recommend selling a trap at the very beginning of the game, without it you will not be able to fish.

p.p.s. If you didn’t find the boat, it’s in cell K1

p.p.p.s. You can use arrows/wasd to move, enter to enter the building, space to set new day.
